name: augean
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe the very bad condition of something, or to describe a very difficult task that involves cleaning or improving something that is in a very bad condition: I usher the children out with apologetic looks towards Barbara, who is starting to tackle the Augean mess we have left behind. Cleaning up corruption will be an Augean task.
More examplesFewer examplesFor the next two years the party should devote itself to the Augean cleaning up and opening up of politics.He has done more than any man living to clean out the Augean headquarters of the Committee.They have done an excellent job cleaning up the Augean stables of bad investment at the bank.
